alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 1:14AM CST until February 18 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...Tennessee... Lookout Creek near New England affecting Dade and Hamilton Counties. For the Lookout Creek...including New England...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lookout Creek near New England. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 11.0 feet and rapidly rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 12.5 feet. It will then fall below flood stage Friday night. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
